1110011010001010 0100010010001111 0 -> sum: 0010101100011001, cout: 1
1010010110011100 1110110011100110 0 -> sum: 1001001010000010, cout: 1

0101010000110010 1101010110001000 0 -> sum: 0010100110111010, cout: 1

0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
